org.mini2Dx.ecs.system

Interface System<T extends Entity>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Box2DSystem, ScreenManagerSystem, UUIDSystem

    public interface System<T extends Entity>
    A common interface for implementing Systems as part of the Entity-Component-System pattern
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEntity(T entity)
      Adds an Entity to the System
      void initialise(GameContainer gc)
      Initialise the System
      void interpolate(GameContainer gc, float alpha)
      Interpolate the System
      boolean isDebugging()
      Returns if this System is debugging

      Removes an Entity from the System
      void render(GameContainer gc, Graphics g)
      Render the System
      void setDebugging(boolean debugging)
      Sets whether or not this System is in debug mode
      void update(GameContainer gc, float delta)
      Update the System

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        void addEntity(T entity)
        Adds an Entity to the System
        Parameters:
        entity - The Entity to be added

      • removeEntity

        void removeEntity(T entity)
        Removes an Entity from the System
        Parameters:
        entity - The UUIDEntity to be removed

      • initialise

        void initialise(GameContainer gc)
        Initialise the System
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer calling initialise

      • update

        void update(GameContainer gc,
          float delta)
        Update the System
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer calling update
        delta - The time in seconds since the last update

      • interpolate

        void interpolate(GameContainer gc,
               float alpha)
        Interpolate the System
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer calling interpolate
        alpha - The alpha value to use during interpolation

      • render

        void render(GameContainer gc,
          Graphics g)
        Render the System
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer calling render
        g - The Graphics instance

      • isDebugging

        boolean isDebugging()
        Returns if this System is debugging
        Returns:
        True if debugging

      • setDebugging

        void setDebugging(boolean debugging)
        Sets whether or not this System is in debug mode
        Parameters:
        debugging - True if debugging
